title: Johnny Depp’s gaunt, pale appearance worries fans
content: Johnny Depp has sparked concern after appearing dramatically different while touring Russia with his rock band.   Fans commented on Johnny’s pale and gaunt appearance with some concerned that the actor has fallen ill.  Johnny - Tattoo - Work - T-shirt - Slogan Johnny showed off his extensive tattoo work as he donned a T-shirt emblazoned with the slogan, “Stay humble or be humbled.”  Posing with supporters, he completed the look with several necklaces and distressed denim jeans.  Fans - Pictures - Instagram - Account - Actor Several fans commented on pictures shared by an Instagram account dedicated to the actor.  One concerned fanatic put: “He looks pale here. Hope he’s okay.”  Movie Another speculated: “He looks like this for a new movie. He is fine and not sick.”  One fan tweeted: “Jonny Depp looks so bad, omg, is he ill or something?”  Johnny - World - Tour - Rock - Supergroup Johnny is currently on a mammoth world tour with his rock supergroup,...
